segments.text: Mr.black has been getting a little around aside .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm surprised . He does't look like a guy who'd ever cheat on his wife , does he ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , he doesn't . But his wife found out he has been too charming for a long time.Incredibly , he has many different girlfriends . Starting almost right after they married 20 years ago .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I'm really surprised . You are not doing anything behind my back , are you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , the only thing I've ever done behind your back is zip you up , besides I told all my other girlfriends , and my wife who's getting suspicious . and we had a cold for a while , tell the
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Haha ... You are not very funny . I guess that means - - except me to tell my lover we have stoped seeing each other too .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You are not funny either . I can't believe I married a woman like you .
segments.speaker: S1
